sn20.1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn20.1:1.4_2: kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo sabbā tā kūṭaṅgamā kūṭasamosaraṇā kūṭasamugghātā sabbā tā samugghātaṁ gacchanti;
sn20.1:1.5_2: ye keci akusalā dhammā sabbe te avijjāmūlakā avijjāsamosaraṇā avijjāsamugghātā,
sn20.2:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn20.2:1.4_0: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yo cāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito yā cāyaṁ mahāpathavī”ti?
sn20.2:1.6_0: Appamattakoyaṁ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito.
sn20.2:1.7_0: Saṅkhampi na upeti upanidhimpi na upeti kalabhāgampi na upeti mahāpathaviṁ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito”ti.
sn20.2:1.8_0: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussesu paccājāyanti;
sn20.2:1.9_0: atha kho eteyeva bahutarā sattā ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti.
sn20.3:1.2_2: yāni kānici kulāni bahutthikāni appapurisāni tāni suppadhaṁsiyāni honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi;
sn20.3:1.3_2: yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettācetovimutti abhāvitā abahulīkatā so suppadhaṁsiyo hoti amanussehi.
sn20.3:1.4_2: yāni kānici kulāni appitthikāni bahupurisāni tāni duppadhaṁsiyāni honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi;
sn20.3:1.5_2: yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettācetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā so duppadhaṁsiyo hoti amanussehi.
sn20.3:1.7_0: ‘mettā no cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā’ti.
sn20.4:1.2_5: yo vā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ antamaso gadduhanamattampi mettacittaṁ bhāveyya,
sn20.4:1.2_6: yo vā majjhanhikasamayaṁ antamaso gadduhanamattampi mettacittaṁ bhāveyya,
sn20.4:1.2_7: yo vā sāyanhasamayaṁ antamaso gadduhanamattampi mettacittaṁ bhāveyya,
sn20.4:1.4_0: ‘mettā no cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā’ti.
sn20.5:1.4_0: ‘ahaṁ imaṁ sattiṁ tiṇhaphalaṁ pāṇinā vā muṭṭhinā vā paṭileṇissāmi paṭikoṭṭissāmi paṭivaṭṭessāmī’ti.
sn20.5:1.6_0: bhabbo nu kho so puriso amuṁ sattiṁ tiṇhaphalaṁ pāṇinā vā muṭṭhinā vā paṭileṇetuṁ paṭikoṭṭetuṁ paṭivaṭṭetun”ti?
sn20.5:1.9_1: satti tiṇhaphalā na sukarā pāṇinā vā muṭṭhinā vā paṭileṇetuṁ paṭikoṭṭetuṁ paṭivaṭṭetuṁ.
sn20.5:1.10_0: Yāvadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
sn20.5:2.1_2: yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettācetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā,
sn20.5:2.1_3: tassa ce amanusso cittaṁ khipitabbaṁ maññeyya;
sn20.5:2.2_0: atha kho sveva amanusso kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assa.
sn20.5:2.4_0: ‘mettā no cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā’ti.
sn20.6:1.2_2: cattāro daḷhadhammā dhanuggahā susikkhitā katahatthā katūpāsanā catuddisā ṭhitā assu.
sn20.6:1.4_0: ‘ahaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ daḷhadhammānaṁ dhanuggahānaṁ susikkhitānaṁ katahatthānaṁ katūpāsanānaṁ catuddisā
sn20.6:1.4_1: kaṇḍe khitte appatiṭṭhite pathaviyaṁ gahetvā āharissāmī’ti.
sn20.6:2.1_1: daḷhadhammassa dhanuggahassa susikkhitassa katahatthassa katūpāsanassa kaṇḍaṁ khittaṁ appatiṭṭhitaṁ pathaviyaṁ gahetvā āhareyya:
sn20.6:2.2_1: ko pana vādo catunnaṁ daḷhadhammānaṁ dhanuggahānaṁ susikkhitānaṁ katahatthānaṁ katūpāsanānan”ti?
sn20.6:3.1_0: “Yathā ca, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa javo, yathā ca candimasūriyānaṁ javo, tato sīghataro.
sn20.6:3.2_2: tassa purisassa javo yathā ca candimasūriyānaṁ javo yathā ca yā devatā candimasūriyānaṁ purato dhāvanti tāsaṁ devatānaṁ javo,
sn20.7:1.2_0: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, dasārahānaṁ ānako nāma mudiṅgo ahosi.
sn20.7:1.3_0: Tassa dasārahā ānake ghaṭite aññaṁ āṇiṁ odahiṁsu.
sn20.7:1.4_0: Ahu kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ ānakassa mudiṅgassa porāṇaṁ pokkharaphalakaṁ antaradhāyi.
sn20.7:1.6_3: ye te suttantā tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīratthā lokuttarā suññatappaṭisaṁyuttā,
sn20.7:1.6_4: tesu bhaññamānesu na sussūsissanti na sotaṁ odahissanti na aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpessanti na ca te dhamme uggahetabbaṁ pariyāpuṇitabbaṁ maññissanti.
sn20.7:2.1_0: Ye pana te suttantā kavikatā kāveyyā cittakkharā cittabyañjanā bāhirakā sāvakabhāsitā,
sn20.7:2.1_4: te ca dhamme uggahetabbaṁ pariyāpuṇitabbaṁ maññissanti.
sn20.7:2.2_2: suttantānaṁ tathāgatabhāsitānaṁ gambhīrānaṁ gambhīratthānaṁ lokuttarānaṁ suññatappaṭisaṁyuttānaṁ antaradhānaṁ bhavissati.
sn20.7:2.4_0: ‘ye te suttantā tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīratthā lokuttarā suññatappaṭisaṁyuttā,
sn20.7:2.4_4: te ca dhamme uggahetabbaṁ pariyāpuṇitabbaṁ maññissāmā’ti.
sn20.8:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
sn20.8:2.1_0: “Kaliṅgarūpadhānā, bhikkhave, etarahi licchavī viharanti appamattā ātāpino upāsanasmiṁ.
sn20.8:2.2_0: Tesaṁ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto na labhati otāraṁ na labhati ārammaṇaṁ.
sn20.8:2.3_0: Bhavissanti, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṁ licchavī sukhumālā mudutalunahatthapādā
sn20.8:2.4_0: te mudukāsu seyyāsu tūlabibbohanāsu yāvasūriyuggamanā seyyaṁ kappissanti.
sn20.8:2.5_0: Tesaṁ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto lacchati otāraṁ lacchati ārammaṇaṁ.
sn20.8:3.1_0: Kaliṅgarūpadhānā, bhikkhave, etarahi bhikkhū viharanti appamattā ātāpino padhānasmiṁ.
sn20.8:3.2_0: Tesaṁ māro pāpimā na labhati otāraṁ na labhati ārammaṇaṁ.
sn20.8:3.3_0: Bhavissanti, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṁ bhikkhū sukhumā mudutalunahatthapādā.
sn20.8:3.4_0: Te mudukāsu seyyāsu tūlabibbohanāsu yāvasūriyuggamanā seyyaṁ kappissanti.
sn20.8:3.5_0: Tesaṁ māro pāpimā lacchati otāraṁ lacchati ārammaṇaṁ.
sn20.9:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn20.9:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro navo bhikkhu ativelaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamati.
sn20.9:1.7_0: “ime hi nāma therā bhikkhū kulāni upasaṅkamitabbaṁ maññissanti, kimaṅgaṁ panāhan”ti?
sn20.9:2.1_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn20.9:2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn20.9:2.2_0: “idha, bhante, aññataro navo bhikkhu ativelaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamati.
sn20.9:2.6_0: ‘ime hi nāma therā bhikkhū kulāni upasaṅkamitabbaṁ maññissanti, kimaṅgaṁ panāhan’”ti.
sn20.9:3.3_0: Te taṁ sarasiṁ ogāhetvā soṇḍāya bhisamuḷālaṁ abbuhetvā suvikkhālitaṁ vikkhāletvā akaddamaṁ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharanti.
sn20.9:3.4_0: Tesaṁ taṁ vaṇṇāya ceva hoti balāya ca,
sn20.9:3.4_1: na ca tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchanti maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
sn20.9:3.5_2: mahānāgānaṁ anusikkhamānā taruṇā bhiṅkacchāpā taṁ sarasiṁ ogāhetvā soṇḍāya bhisamuḷālaṁ abbuhetvā na
sn20.9:3.6_0: Tesaṁ taṁ neva vaṇṇāya hoti na balāya.
sn20.9:3.7_0: Tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchanti maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
sn20.9:4.1_2: idha therā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisanti.
sn20.9:4.4_0: Te taṁ lābhaṁ agadhitā amucchitā anajjhopannā ādīnavadassāvino nissaraṇapaññā paribhuñjanti.
sn20.9:4.5_0: Tesaṁ taṁ vaṇṇāya ceva hoti balāya ca,
sn20.9:4.5_1: na ca tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchanti maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
sn20.9:4.6_2: therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anusikkhamānā navā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisanti.
sn20.9:4.9_0: Te taṁ lābhaṁ gadhitā mucchitā ajjhopannā anādīnavadassāvino anissaraṇapaññā paribhuñjanti.
sn20.9:4.10_0: Tesaṁ taṁ neva vaṇṇāya hoti na balāya,
sn20.9:4.10_1: te tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchanti maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
sn20.9:4.12_0: ‘agadhitā amucchitā anajjhopannā ādīnavadassāvino nissaraṇapaññā taṁ lābhaṁ paribhuñjissāmā’ti.
sn20.10:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu ativelaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati.
sn20.10:1.5_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno na viramati.
sn20.10:1.6_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn20.10:1.6_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn20.10:1.7_0: “idha, bhante, aññataro bhikkhu ativelaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati.
sn20.10:1.10_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno na viramatī”ti.
sn20.10:2.1_0: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, biḷāro sandhisamalasaṅkaṭīre ṭhito ahosi mudumūsiṁ maggayamāno:
sn20.10:2.2_0: ‘yadāyaṁ mudumūsi gocarāya pakkamissati, tattheva naṁ gahetvā khādissāmī’ti.
sn20.10:2.3_0: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, mudumūsi gocarāya pakkāmi.
sn20.10:2.4_0: Tamenaṁ biḷāro gahetvā sahasā saṅkhāditvā ajjhohari.
sn20.10:2.5_0: Tassa so mudumūsi antampi khādi, antaguṇampi khādi.
sn20.10:2.6_0: So tatonidānaṁ maraṇampi nigacchi maraṇamattampi dukkhaṁ.
sn20.10:3.1_2: idhekacco bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati arakkhiteneva
sn20.10:3.2_0: So tattha passati mātugāmaṁ dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā.
sn20.10:3.3_0: Tassa mātugāmaṁ disvā dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
sn20.10:3.4_0: So rāgānuddhaṁsena cittena maraṇaṁ vā nigacchati maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
sn20.10:3.5_0: Maraṇañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
sn20.10:3.6_0: Maraṇamattañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ yadidaṁ aññataraṁ saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
sn20.10:3.9_2: saṁvutehi indriyehi gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā’ti.
sn20.11:1.2_0: “Assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ jarasiṅgālassa vassamānassā”ti?
sn20.11:1.4_0: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, jarasiṅgālo ukkaṇḍakena nāma rogajātena phuṭṭho.
sn20.11:1.5_0: So yena yena icchati tena tena gacchati;
sn20.11:1.6_0: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha tiṭṭhati;
sn20.11:1.7_0: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nisīdati;
sn20.11:1.8_0: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nipajjati;
sn20.11:1.10_2: yaṁ idhekacco sakyaputtiyapaṭiñño evarūpampi attabhāvapaṭilābhaṁ paṭisaṁvediyetha.
sn20.12:1.2_0: “Assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ jarasiṅgālassa vassamānassā”ti?
sn20.12:1.4_2: tasmiṁ jarasiṅgāle yā kāci kataññutā kataveditā,
sn20.12:1.4_3: na tveva idhekacce sakyaputtiyapaṭiññe siyā yā kāci kataññutā kataveditā.
sn20.12:1.7_0: na ca no amhesu appakampi kataṁ nassissatī’ti.
